#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
#define mod 1000000007
#define rep(i,s,e) for(int i=s;i<e;i++)

int main()
{
	int t,n,k;
	long long ans;
	

	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		ans=1;
		scanf("%d%d",&n,&k);
		rep(i,n-k+1,n+1)
		{
			ans=(ans%mod*i%mod)%mod;
		}
	    printf("%lld\n",ans);

	}
}
